::Prowl/Firearm::

Prowl swirls in the air, but is still hit by one of the photom 
blasts. He flips a bit but regains stability, firing two missiles 
down at Triggerhappy.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The shots from Triggerhappy hit Firearm, doing little damage to the 
tank's armor.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Triggerhappy/Composer::
> 
>        Triggerhappy is hit by 20 of Chromedome's rapid lasers and 
all of Brainstorm's shots.  Before getting hit by any more fire, 
Triggerhappy transformed into jet mode, and thrusted towards Prowl, 
firing his double sided twin photon blasters twice at Prowl, and also 
he kept on speeding to hit Prowl as well.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>      Composer looks to Wheeljack.
> 
>       "Well, let's start those tests," he said.
